name: HabitLink
signal_source: Behavior change forums: 'Habit apps work for 2 weeks then I forget to open them'
description: Ambient habit reinforcement that integrates habit cues into existing daily technology use patterns
target_user: Individuals who struggle with habit consistency due to forgetting to engage with dedicated habit tracking apps
pain_point_evidence: High abandonment rates of habit tracking apps due to the need to remember to use yet another app
differentiation: Habits integrated into existing device usage rather than requiring separate app engagement
subscription_fit: Premium features for advanced cue customization and detailed behavior analytics

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic ambient cues, premium unlocks advanced customization and analytics
